SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!List : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "List" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_LIST_NETWORK_TYPE# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LIST NETWORKS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LIST NETWORKS ACTION FAILED ********"
: SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = "virsh net-list"
!List : SWITCH &UC4RB_KVM_LIST_NETWORK_TYPE# : CASE "All networks" : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --all")
: CASE "Only inactive networks" : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --inactive") : ENDSWITCH
:PRINT "Command Executed :: &UC4RB_KVM_CMD#"
&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#
execcode=$? if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
output=`&UC4RB_KVM_CMD# | wc -l` comma="," result="" temp="" index=0 &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# | while read -r line ; do temp=`echo "$line" | awk '{print $1}'` index=$(expr $index + 1) if [ 3 -eq $output ] ; then break fi if [ $index -eq $((output-1)) ] ; then echo $index echo $((output-1)) result+=$temp echo "UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_LIST::=$result" break fi if [ $index -gt 2 ]; then result+=$temp$comma fi done
echo "UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_COUNT::=$((output-3))"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_COUNT# = "" :SET &UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_LIST# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_KVM_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_COUNT" : SET &UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_COUNT# = "&VALUE#"
: CASE "UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_LIST" : SET &UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_LIST# = "&VALUE#" : ENDSWITCH
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_COUNT#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_KVM_NETWORK_LIST#,,"WORKFLOW"
